title: Understanding SQL Clauses
text: In SQL, clauses are used to specify conditions or actions in a query. They help in filtering, sorting, and organizing data.

title: Common SQL Clauses
text: Some common SQL clauses include SELECT, FROM, WHERE, ORDER BY, and GROUP BY. Each serves a specific purpose in a query.

title: Purpose of the WHERE Clause
text: The WHERE clause is used to filter records that meet a certain condition. It is often used in conjunction with SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE, etc.

title: Identify the Filtering Clause
text: Which word starts a clause to filter results based on a condition?
